column4: hi, i need help.. having trouble with a 2.2gig tarball and burning it to a dvd
the file just won't add to the list of files to burn in gnomebaker or graveman, i select it and press 'open' but nothing shows :(
anyone?? i'm very confused.. is there a file size limit for burning? or for ext3??
ehm.. for burning there is a limit (the size of the medium).
that's fine though (4.7gig) .. so there isn't an individual file size limit either for burning or on ext3??
ehm.. it depends on the kernel. However it is known to support above 2TIB files
